title: Manicure Kit By Aoyuele Nail Clippers Set 13 in 1 Grooming Kit Stainless Steel Professional Pedicure Kit,Nail Tools with Travel Case
features: ★ 13pcs nail clippers set can be used at manicuring, pedicuring, eyebrow shaping, anti-acne, exfoliating, etc. A set of practical nail kit to meet all the needs of the face head and foot care. Perfect for men, women, girls, boys, seniors.

★ These nail clipping tools are all made with Stainless Steel, great hardness and durable, never rusts, the edge of each has been polished repeatedly to have a comfort grip, the blade can keep durable after a repetitive polishing and hardening process, give you a smooth and cleaning cutting

★ The PU-leather suitcase is portable and can be easily opened with one press of the button, which can definitely protect, store your tools and prevent them from loss. With the suitcase, you will become an elegant woman or man at anytime and anywhere.

★ Professional Travel Pedicure Kit has a high-grade leather case, easy to clean and hygienic. For your health, it's best to use your own nail care kit as a separate tool for your fingers and toes to maintain good care practices.

★ We want you to be satisfied with your purchase and we are fully committed to giving you the best. You are welcomed to contact us through amazon message if you have any problems. We usually answer within 24 hours.
description: 6.1 L X 3.3 W X 0.8 H inches

1 x Nail Cleaner:For cleaning dirt in nail 1 x Nail File : For making nails smooth 1 x V-shaped Cuticle Trimmer: For trim the shaped cuticle of the nail  1 x Cuticle Nipper: For trimming cuticles 1 x Pedicure Knife: For cleaning dead skin of feet 1 x Larger Nail Clipper: For trimming hard and thick toenails 1 x Medium nail clippers : For trimming finger nails 1 x Slanted Edge Nail Clippers : For trimming the corner of nails 1 x Eyebrow Tweezers: For shaping up brows flawlessly by removing all unwanted eyebrow 1 x Eyebrow Scissors: For trimming eyebrow 1 x Blackhead Acne Remover : For removing blackhead or acne 1 x Earwax Spoon: For removing large chunks of earwax 1 x Extrusion Ring: For Blackhead/Acne removing, acne treatment  --- As the picture shows ---

1.Putting the grooming kit back to the package and in a dry environment when you don’t need it. Good maintenance ,blade will be still sharp and don’t rust after several years.  2.Keep the kit away from children and use with in the guidance of adults as the tools supplied contain sharp, pointed edges.  3.Never use any tool on the damaged area of the skin.
